column4: dyme: Windows is already getting 6 different versions. It's going to be very hard work trying to do all of that. Vista will include Internet Explorer, which ISN'T integrated into the system, making it more secure. What would be the point in doing this anyway?
windows is offtopic, please take it to #ubuntu-offtopic
Thanks for the link. Sorry for the disturbance if there was any. :-)
